name: Street Fighter II NE (NES DEMO)
description:
Street Fighter II - Nostalgic Edition is a DEMO to show how I ever imagined my favorite game of all time running in our beloved NES and Famicom.

In this demo you can choose only Ryu and play against the computer. There's some known bugs but the game is still playable.

I hope you enjoy!

This game is in no way affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with CAPCOM.

It's a fan-made work which aims to preserve video game history.
